title: Number of U.S. patents held by tech companies in 2012
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of U.S. patents for 20 number of Companys.
The maximum Number of U.S. patents 47855.0 is found at Company Samsung and the minimum is found at Amazon where Number of U.S. patents is 448.0.
There is a difference of 47407.0 between the maximum Company Samsung and minimum Company Amazon.
